referenceObject.reference: Brescovit, A. D. & Cizauskas, I. (2025). Description of three new species of Anapistula Gertsch, 1941 from caves, with new distribution records for Brazilian Symphytognatha carstica Brescovit, Álvares & Lopes, 2004 (Araneae: Symphytognathidae).
